original_text: And the soul that turneth after such as have familiar spirits, and after wizards, to go a whoring after them, I will even set my face against that soul, and will cut him off from among his people.
korean_text: 접신한 자와 박수무당을 음란하게 따르는 자에게는 내가 진노하여 그를 그의 백성 중에서 끊으리니

sentences.original_text: And the soul that turneth after such as have familiar spirits
to go a whoring after them
I will even set my face against that soul
and will cut him off from among his people
